page.title: 10SCHOOL SUMMER PRODUCTION
page.content: At the end of the summer term the school puts on a music and drama production.Mr Baldwins class is doing a play about Jonah and the whale,our class is doing a play called Can't Do Frogs,it is about a princess who wants to marry a jester but her father the king wants her to marry a man called Baron Nasty,but in the end Baron Nasty is turned into Baron Nice and the princess marries the jester.The choir are next they sing songs about Jonah. There are eleven recorders and they are playing four pieces of music.Then the ochestra play five pieces of music Memory,Portsmouth,A musical joke,Mull of Kintyre a Land of Hope and Glory, There are sixteen people in the ochestra.The production is on from 7pm to 8.30pm.It should be a very good show.
